name: Hoshi Wo Miru Hito (remake)
description:
"Hoshi wo Miru Hito... known through Japan as "Densetsu no Kusoge"... not all that good of a game, right? Well, that game apparent;y had some fans, because I can think of no other reason this gem came up:

http://www5b.biglobe.ne.jp/~kiss-me/aji/star/index.html

So, what is this? It's a remake of Hoshi wo Miru Hito, and... WHOA. What a major improvement. I mean, it's basically a totally different game! I mean, wow. Great music, graphics... and the way characters progress throughout the game is similar to the SaGa series of games, so if you're a fan of those, you'll most probably feel right at home with this."
